LanguageData.Plant_AYLavender.label: Lavender
LanguageData.Plant_AYLavender.description: Lavandula (common name lavender) is a genus of flowering plants in the mint family, Lamiaceae. The most widely cultivated species, Lavandula angustifolia, is often referred to as lavender, and there is a color named for the shade of the flowers of this species.
